-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)
-| diffsw(s1, wf(c0, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s1, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wex(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)
